background.title: Background Color
background.description: Color of the out of game area on extremely wide devices

rotateWhenLandscape.title: Rotate when landscape
rotateWhenLandscape.description: Causes the game to rotate the view when in landscape orientation

gameOverText.title: Game Over Text
gameOverText.description: Text to display when the game completes

introText.title: Intro Text
introText.description: Text to display in the speach bubble in the intro

fastMode.title: Fast Mode
fastMode.description: Game characters move faster when enabled

targetCash.title: Target Cash
targetCash.description: Amount of cash the player needs to collect to complete the game

idleTimeout.title: Idle Timeout
idleTimeout.description: Number of seconds of user idle time to wait before jumping to the end screen. Set to 0 to disable.

minDisplayTime.title: Minimum display time
minDisplayTime.description: The minimum number of seconds the load screen should display for if shown

fadeOutTime.title: Fade out time
fadeOutTime.description: Time it takes for the load screen to fade into the game

ctaButtonText.title: CTA Button Text
ctaButtonText.description: Text to display on the CTA button

replayButtonText.title: Replay Button Text
replayButtonText.description: Text to display on the replay button

maxPlays.title: Max Plays
maxPlays.description: Maximum number of games that can be played
